definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Xu Leizhi in the changing shape, each trip has a different outfit.
sentences.chinese: 徐雷智在剧中造型多变，每次出行都有不同的行头。

sentences.english: But the emperor’s new outfit has a few holes.
sentences.chinese: 但是这件皇帝的新行头还是有些漏洞。

sentences.english: That could be why Hobgoblin is still using his outfit.
sentences.chinese: 这个就是为什么红魔一直用他的那身行头。

sentences.english: Let me look at you, girl. Where'd you get those gorgeous togs ?
sentences.chinese: 让我看看妳，女人，妳在哪里买到这么美丽的行头？

sentences.english: Look at this outfit I'm wearing.
Large brooches figured heavily into the formula, as well.
sentences.chinese: 大号的胸针也包括在这套行头中。

sentences.english: You can put on a stylish watch to match your hippest outfit for a party.
sentences.chinese: 你可以戴上流行的表款，跟最时髦的派对行头作搭配。

sentences.english: Five of this went to pay the regular installment on the clothes she had to buy.
sentences.chinese: 其中的5块钱被用来付她非买不可的行头的分期付款。

sentences.english: The clothes, she told reporters, had been birthday presents from friends.
sentences.chinese: 马鲁格对记者称这身行头都是朋友送她的生日礼物。

sentences.english: When that happens, what impression will your wardrobe make?
sentences.chinese: 到那时，你的行头将给别人留下什么样的印象呢？

sentences.english: Gemini goes around the neighborhood once, changes costumes and goes around again.
sentences.chinese: 双子座每去邻居家一次就换一套行头。

definition: to decorate/to adorn/to dress up/to disguise oneself
to decorate/to dress/to make up/to adorn/manner of dressing/style of dress
whole body/from head to toe/single person/a suit of clothes
ceremonial robe/formal attire (dinner suit, evening gown etc)
